'You should speak with Rilbert when you arrive in the Whitshaws.'
'Well done, [placeholder]! You have proven your worth in your joust.'
Whitshaws: Jousting with Rohirrim
'It is time for us to begin our duel!'
Talk to Gyric in Forlaw
Defeat White Hand Warg-riders in the Whitshaws ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat the Rohirrim jouster
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Talk to Gyric in Forlaw

'In the wake of Núrzum's rampage, my folk need the aid of skilled defenders to prevent such a tragedy from occurring again. I have devised trials to prove the worthiness of those who would come to our aid.

'There are many Rohirrim jousters in this area. Challenge one of them to a duel, and if you are victorious, I will consider your worthiness.

'Speak with me again when you are ready to begin.'
Defeat a Rohirrim jouster in a duel
Defeat the Rohirrim jouster
You have defeated the jouster
Talk to Rilbert

'Have you skill on horseback? We will see.

'From here, you can see the Rohirrim jousters who are waiting to test would-be heroes. If you can defeat three of them, I will count your skills worthy of Rohan.

'I suggest you mount up... dispatching these foes will be no easy task afoot.'
Gyric is waiting for your decision in Forlaw.\n\nYou should speak with Gyric when you are ready to travel to the Whitshaws and talk to Rilbert to begin your trial.
You have defeated the jouster
Rohirrim jousters can be found on the field beyond Rilbert.\n\nYou have been tasked with defeating three Rohirrim jousters.
'If you are unable to best the Rohirrim in jousting, how can you defend my people?'
'Well fought, well fought indeed!'
'You should speak with Rilbert when you arrive in the Whitshaws.'
Talk to Gyric to travel to the Whitshaws and speak with Rilbert
Rohirrim jousters can be found on the field beyond Rilbert.\n\nYou have been tasked with defeating three Rohirrim jousters.
Rohirrim jousters can be found on the field beyond Rilbert.\n\nYou have been tasked with defeating three Rohirrim jousters.
'If you are unable to best the Rohirrim in jousting, how can you defend my people?'
'If you are unable to best the Rohirrim in jousting, how can you defend my people?'
You have defeated a jouster
'It is time for us to begin our duel!'
In the wake of Núrzum's rampage, the folk of Wildermore seek the aid of skilled defenders.
Rilbert is at the southern end of the ice-pools in the Whitshaws. Gyric is at Forlaw in the Fallows.\n\nSpeak with either of them to receive your reward.
Defeat the Rohirrim jouster
Defeat a second Rohirrim jouster in a duel
Gyric is at Forlaw in the Fallows.\n\nRilbert sent you back to Gyric to receive your reward.
Defeated White Hand Warg-riders in the Whitshaws ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'It is time for us to begin our duel!'
Defeat a third Rohirrim jouster in a duel
Defeat the Rohirrim jouster
'Rilbert spoke highly of your performance. I think you will find this useful.'
'Well done, [placeholder]! You have proven your worth in your joust.'
'You should speak with Rilbert when you arrive in the Whitshaws.'
'You should speak with Rilbert when you arrive in the Whitshaws.'
